entries.text: Our annual reports provide detailed insights into our financial performance, strategic initiatives, and the economic conditions that have shaped our decisions ...

entries.text: The Quarterly Economic Bulletin is a regular report on key economic statistics published by the Monetary and Economic Policy Group.

entries.title: Monetary Policy Statements | Bank of PNG
entries.text: Monetary Policy Statements will be issued at least every three months from September 2024, when changes to the Central Banking Act increased their frequency.

entries.title: BPNG Research Working Papers | Bank of PNG
entries.text: The Bank of Papua New Guinea Working Paper (BPNGWP) series is intended to provide the results of research undertaken within the Bank (BPNG) to its staff.

entries.title: SEACEN Collaboration Research Project - Bank of Papua New Guinea
entries.text: These research papers are country chapters of books published in collaboration with the SEACEN Centre by researchers from member Central Banks.
